name: SmartCat Cat Loot #49
description:
Smart Toys (Smart Loot) is an Executable NFT (XNFT) from Smart Layer enabled by ERC-5169 and TokenScript on Polygon. It is a Smart drop for Smart Cats. The collection is made out of 1000 Cat Loot xNFTs.

At any point, your Cat Loot xNFT can be burned for a guaranteed WETH return. Return value increases with transaction volume. Minimum WETH return is the sale price of 0.1 WETH minus a 10% transaction fee.

For Adopted Cat holders there are of course extra benefits in terms of Smart Layer points. Play with any of your Adopted Cats to stack more points. All via the Token Interface. No DApp is required. To get involved, grab yourself a Smart Cat and a Smart Toy:

To play -> Grab an XNFT then go to  https://viewer.tokenscript.org/

Learn more -> https://www.smartlayer.network/smartcatloot

Questions and Suggestions -> Discord: https://discord.gg/3sQr2Uhn

Find out more about this Executable NFTs from Smart Layer - https://medium.com/alphawallet/a-smart-drop-for-smart-cats-b3d996205b14
